title: Spicy sweet potato soup

default: 300ml/½ pint hot chicken stock (vegetarians can substitute vegetable stock)
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Place the sweet potato, stock, salt and freshly ground black pepper and dried chilli flakes into a saucepan. Bring to the boil and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the sweet potato is tender.
Pour into a warm serving bowl and top with the double cream. Garnish with the chives and a drizzle of olive oil.
